channel.title: CVE Feed for cifi -- SEO Plugin by Squirrly SEO
channel.description: The latest CVEs for cifi -- SEO Plugin by Squirrly SEO

item.title: CVE-2024-6497|2024-08-09T18:47:36.343Z -- cifi -- seo%20plugin%20by%20squirrly%20seo
item.description: The SEO Plugin by Squirrly SEO plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘url’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 12.3.19 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
